Name: Delinea Secret Server
Author: Delinea
Description:
The [Delinea](https://delinea.com/) Secret Server Microsoft Sentinel Data Solution enables delivery of Delinea Secret Server log messages to your Microsoft Sentinel Workspace.

1. **Delinea Secret Server via AMA** - This data connector helps in ingesting Delinea Secret Server logs into your Log Analytics Workspace using the new Azure Monitor Agent. Learn more about ingesting using the new Azure Monitor Agent [here](https://learn.microsoft.com/azure/sentinel/connect-cef-ama). **Microsoft recommends using this Data Connector**.

2. **Delinea Secret Server via Legacy Agent** - This data connector helps in ingesting Delinea Secret Server logs into your Log Analytics Workspace using the legacy Log Analytics agent.

**NOTE:** Microsoft recommends installation of Delinea Secret Server via AMA Connector. Legacy connector uses the Log Analytics agent which is about to be deprecated by **Aug 31, 2024,** and thus should only be installed where AMA is not supported. Using MMA and AMA on same machine can cause log duplication and extra ingestion cost [more details](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/sentinel/ama-migrate).
